au.org.intersect.dms.workerrouter
Interface WorkerRouter

All Known Implementing Classes:
WorkerRouterImpl
public interface WorkerRouter

A worker router helps the DMS to identify a worker to talk to perform a task. Workers are identified by an id (short integer). There is no
